text: Georgios Liveris (born 10 May 1932) is a Greek former sports shooter. He competed in the 50 metre rifle, three positions and 50 metre rifle, prone events at the 1960 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1932 births Category:Living people Category:Greek male sport shooters Category:Olympic shooters of Greece Category:Shooters at the 1960 Summer Olympics Category:Panathinaikos shooters Category:Sportspeople from Athens
title: Georgios Liveris
